title: Oars + Alps Men's Body Wash, Hydrating with Vitamin E and Antioxidants, Sulfate and Gluten Free, Vegan, California Coast, 1 Pack
features: PREMIUM BODY WASH FOR ACTIVE GUYS: Our body wash is crafted with premium, plant-based ingredients to provide long-lasting hydration throughout the day and night. With tons of awards and thousands of raving fans, we’ve set a new bar for what you should expect from your body wash.

DEEPLY MOISTURIZE WHILE YOU CLEANSE: Our formula is packed with Antioxidants and Vitamin E to intensely moisturize your skin. We leave out the ingredients many body washes include that strip your skin of its oils. No more dry, itchy skin when you leave the shower.
FRESH, CLEAN SCENT: California Coast is a clean, light citrus scent balanced by notes of patchouli, ylang ylang and sandy amber. It’s delightfully fresh and not overpowering.

RICH LATHER WITHOUT THE SULFATES - It’s hard to find a sulfate-free body wash that gets a good lather. Our unique formula gives you rich, luxurious suds that leave your skin moisturized, balanced and clean.

PREMIUM, GOOD-FOR-YOU INGREDIENTS: We thoughtfully curate each ingredient to keep you fresh and moisturized. They’re vegan, animal cruelty-free and dermatologist-tested. We never use sulfates, alcohol, parabens, phthalates or talc.
description: Oars + Alps Body and Face Wash is infused with Vitamin E and Antioxidants for a deeply hydrating and moisturizing clean. This formula is made with our best selling California Coast scent, a clean, light, citrus scent that is balanced by dark notes of patchouli, ylang ylang, and sandy amber. Free from Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates and Gluten. Animal Cruelty-free and Vegan.

We create natural, powerful skin care products without any toxins. We've engineered and tested products that work as hard as you do. The result? Powerful, natural, non-toxic, TSA-approved skin care at a price point that suits.
